Package it.unibo.mvc.view

Class StdoutDrawNumberView

java.lang.Object
it.unibo.mvc.view.StdoutDrawNumberView
All Implemented Interfaces:
DrawNumberView
public class StdoutDrawNumberView extends Object implements DrawNumberView
This class represents a view that is output only and writes its information on stdout.
